About the Company: Roxy Exports Ltd was established in the year 1988. They are the manufacturer of Bicycles & Bicycle Parts mainly Bicycle RIMS and HUBS, FREEWHEEL, etc. We have recently started producing PVC Pipes and are successfully selling the same in Indian market. They are located in Ludhiana, Punjab.
